title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Future is Human: Intentional Innovation in the AI Era (WOC102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 未来以人为本：AI时代的有意创新 (WOC102)
abstract: The pace of change in technology and the cloud demands human-centered leadership, grounded in intention and inclusion. Today’s leaders must deliver progress at speed while earning trust and creating cultures where both people and ideas can thrive in the future of work. This session brings together women driving transformation in the cloud to share how intentional leadership requires listening deeply, fostering confidence, and navigating uncertainty. Learn the priorities that drive meaningful impact and enable innovation in today’s rapidly evolving landscape. Moderated by Christina Mitine, Sr. Go-To-Market Lead. The panel will feature AWS Customers.
abstract_cn: 技术和云计算的变革步伐要求以人为本的领导力，植根于意图和包容性。当今的领导者必须快速推进进步，同时赢得信任并创造让人才和创意在未来工作中蓬勃发展的文化。本次会议汇集了推动云计算转型的女性领导者，分享有意图的领导力如何需要深入倾听、培养信心和驾驭不确定性。了解在当今快速演变的环境中推动有意义影响和促进创新的优先事项。由Christina Mitine（高级市场推广负责人）主持。小组成员将包括AWS客户。
